snippet.title: Pitchers are vulnerable to line drives to mound
snippet.description:
Sunday May 30, 2010 6:20 pm
... hopes to make his next start. Others have not been so lucky. Last season, the Dodgers lost Hiroki Kuroda... in his skull. In 2000, Boston righty Bryce Florie's vision was impaired when he was tagged in the right... tried to make a comeback the next season but never succeeded as a big league pitcher again. Herb Score,
